law.catch_line: Penalty for violations of KRS 367.4774 and 367.381.

text.section: Any person who knowingly violates or causes to be violated any provision of KRS 367.4774 shall be guilty of a Class C felony.
Any person who knowingly violates or causes to be violated any provision of KRS 367.381 shall be guilty of a Class C felony.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 209, sec. 8, effective July 14, 1992; and ch. 301, sec. 7, effective July 14, 1992.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/14/92). This section was enacted by two 1992 Acts which do not appear to be in conflict and have been compiled together.
